news.content:
üì£ TFT Fiat Gateway Beta Testing Program


In ongoing efforts to make the ThreeFold Token (TFT) more accessible, it will now be possible to buy TFT with a credit or debit card via the Get TFT platform!


The beta testing program incentivizes the validation of the experience, from the community. As a gesture of gratitude, participants will earn a 500 TFT ‚Äúcash back,‚Äù provided by ThreeFold.


Get involved here üôè
news.excerpt: We're making TFT more accessible! Help us test the Fiat Gateway and earn 500 TFT.
